article.headline: Binghamton 60, Maine 46
article.story: VESTAL, N.Y. (AP) -- Joe White had 10 points and nine rebounds and Billy Williams added 10 points to lead Binghamton over Maine 60-46 Wednesday night. Sebastian Hermenier had nine points for Binghamton (5-8, 2-1 America East), which took a 31-25 halftime lead. Williams also added four steals. Eric Dobson and Chris Markwood led Maine (8-4, 1-1) with 11 points.
